## Housekeeping

* Lab this week is at CBL. We will be outside on the dock the whole time. Dress for the weather. Wear closed-toe shoes that are comfortable (sneakers, crocs, etc.).

## Learning objectives

* Define *benthic*, *benthos*, *plankton*, *nekton*, *epifauna*, and *infauna*
* Describe the ecological importance of benthic organisms
* Describe common environmental variables that can affect the health and distribution of benthic organisms
* Describe common methods for sampling benthic organisms
